This lightweight oil provides 92 percent more shine**, and up to 10x smoother* and 10x stronger* hair. This luxurious hair oil controls frizz up to 96 hours, strengthens hair, and provides heat protection up to 450°F. This multi-benefit oil can be used as an instant conditioning treatment to deeply nourish hair, a styling aid to reduce frizz, or a finishing touch to your final style for shiny and soft hair...The new iconic hair oil is now refillable. The bottle is made of least 30% recycled glass**** and the refill is made of at least 95% recycled plastic.***.Fragrance Description: The top notes are Mandarin and freesia violet leaves; middle notes are cedarwood and heliotrope violet flower; and bottom notes are sandalwood musk and courarine..Clinical Results:.This lightweight oil provides up to 92% more shine**, up to 10x smoother* and up to 10x stronger* hair..*vs non-conditioning shampoo.**vs unwashed hair.***Except the cap, the pump, the label.**** Except Cap and pump...Allure
ingredients: -Wild Camellia Flower: Resilient flower with high concentration of antioxidants to nourish hair. ..Isododecane, Dimethicone, C11-13 Isoalkane, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Dimethiconol, Amodimethicone, Camellia Oleifera Seed Oil, Zea Mays Germ Oil / Corn Germ Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Pentaclethra Macroloba Seed Oil, Camelina Sativa Seed Oil, Linalool, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Limonene, Coumarin, Benzyl Alcohol, Camellia Japonica Flower Extract, Phyllanthus Emblica Fruit Extract, Tocopherol, Parfum / Fragrance.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:..-Apply one to two pumps on mid-lengths and ends to bring a touch of shine during your styling routine..-Use as often as needed. reviews.review_text: I was so thrilled to try this beautiful hair oil! It's a gorgeous bottle, and I have heard wonderful things about the brand for years. The packaging is exciting to open--It's incredibly elegant, and the golden hue feels luxurious and inviting. I was so enchanted by the scent! I'm very sensitive to fragrance, and usually can't tolerate much other than essential oils without a headache. This gave me no issues whatsoever! The smell is very subtle--It will not overpower anyone around you when you walk into a room, but makes the application process comforting and delightful. It's sophisticated, sensual, warm, and slightly sweet without being in any way cloying or juvenile--It almost reminds me of cherry blossoms or figs, amber or vanilla--Something warm, sweet, and just barely floral, like when you smell the center of a magnolia. It's a very unique blend of fragrance notes all its own. This was a lovely attribute and turned using it into an experience.  When it comes to the application and finish, I find that some hair oils can make your hair look oily, so I was nervous about that, but I applied it carefully and in layers, starting with the underside of my hair, and adding more as I went. I didn't get any greasy look whatsoever! I was so happy about that! I will say that I was expecting to be able to use the product to separate some of my ends into piece-y bits, or to fluff up/volumize at the root, but it doesn't seem to be made for that. I also don't feel this is the most hydrating oil--I thought it might moisturize my drier ends, but they weren't as hydrated as I expected from the product. Where this shines is as a rich, yet light, finishing oil that provides softness and a beautiful, healthy shine that feels glorious to touch!  I'm incredibly grateful for the opportunity to sample Elixir Ultime Hair Oil! Thank you so much, Kerastase, BzzAgent, and Sephora, for this free product in exchange for an honest review! It was such a treat to try!
